tabContents.title: Toastr
tabContents.message: Toastr is a Javascript library for non-blocking notifications. jQuery is required. It uses CSS3 for animations and comes with a few built-in themes.

tabContents.title: API
tabContents.message: Toastr provides a simple API to create notifications. The API is designed to be easy to use and understand.

tabContents.title: Types
tabContents.message: Toastr supports four types of notifications: success, info, warning, and error. Each type has its own default styling and icon.
